item.title: Belarus frees 123 prisoners as US lifts sanctions
item.description: Opposition activist Maria Kolesnikova is among those released in exchange for a deal with the US.

item.title: Street art festival sees Lagos turned into 'open-air gallery'
item.description: Nigeria's biggest city is known for its vibrant arts scene, nightlife and creativity, but street art is relatively unknown.

item.title: Cambodia shuts border crossings with Thailand as fighting continues
item.description: It comes despite US President Donald Trump saying both sides had agreed to a ceasefire deal.

item.title: One million households without power in Ukraine after Russia attacks energy grid
item.description: The latest overnight attacks come as US envoy Steve Witkoff prepares to hold more talks with Ukraine's president.

item.title: Angry fans throw chairs and bottles at Messi event in India
item.description: The Inter Miami and Argentina forward is in India for a tour, taking in events in Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai and Delhi.
